uk.ac.ucl.cs.gc01.restaurant_billing_system.app - package uk.ac.ucl.cs.gc01.restaurant_billing_system.app
Provides the classes necessary to create an applet and the classes an applet uses to navigate the GUI.
uk.ac.ucl.cs.gc01.restaurant_billing_system.database_management - package uk.ac.ucl.cs.gc01.restaurant_billing_system.database_management
Provides the classes necessary to query the database in order to manipulate elements in the database.
uk.ac.ucl.cs.gc01.restaurant_billing_system.gui_testers - package uk.ac.ucl.cs.gc01.restaurant_billing_system.gui_testers
Package contains deprecated GUI testers
uk.ac.ucl.cs.gc01.restaurant_billing_system.objects - package uk.ac.ucl.cs.gc01.restaurant_billing_system.objects
Provides the classes necessary to represent the different objects that form the restaurant in order to build the system.
updateCurrentOrderId(Table) - Method in class uk.ac.ucl.cs.gc01.restaurant_billing_system.database_management.TableManager
Updates the Table_master table in the database.
updateLastLogin() - Method in class uk.ac.ucl.cs.gc01.restaurant_billing_system.database_management.StaffManager
Updates the lastLogin column of the Staff table in the database for the currently connected employee
updateNumberOfPeople(Table, int) - Method in class uk.ac.ucl.cs.gc01.restaurant_billing_system.app.TablesController
Updates the number of people in the capacity labels based on the current status of the table as well as the number of people.
updateNumberOfPeople(Table) - Method in class uk.ac.ucl.cs.gc01.restaurant_billing_system.database_management.TableManager
Updates the Table_master table in the database by updating the the current number of people at a table as specified by table number in the object passed as an argument.
updateTableRecord(Table) - Method in class uk.ac.ucl.cs.gc01.restaurant_billing_system.database_management.TableManager
Updates the Table_master table in the database by updating the information relative to the specified table number in the Table object passed as an argument.

username - Variable in class uk.ac.ucl.cs.gc01.restaurant_billing_system.objects.Employee
 
usernameField - Variable in class uk.ac.ucl.cs.gc01.restaurant_billing_system.app.LoginController
 
usernameText - Variable in class uk.ac.ucl.cs.gc01.restaurant_billing_system.app.StaffController
